00004 from error import MarkedYAMLError
00005 from events import *
00006 from nodes import *
00007 
00008 class ComposerError(MarkedYAMLError):
00009     pass
00010 
00011 class Composer(object):
00012 
00013     def __init__(self):
00014         self.anchors = {}
00015 
00016     def check_node(self):
00017         # Drop the STREAM-START event.
00018         if self.check_event(StreamStartEvent):
00019             self.get_event()
00020 
00021         # If there are more documents available?
00022         return not self.check_event(StreamEndEvent)
00023 
00024     def get_node(self):
00025         # Get the root node of the next document.
00026         if not self.check_event(StreamEndEvent):
00027             return self.compose_document()
00028 
00029     def compose_document(self):
00030         # Drop the DOCUMENT-START event.
00031         self.get_event()
00032 
00033         # Compose the root node.
00034         node = self.compose_node(None, None)
00035 
00036         # Drop the DOCUMENT-END event.
00037         self.get_event()
00038 
00039         self.anchors = {}
00040         return node
00041 
00042     def compose_node(self, parent, index):
00043         if self.check_event(AliasEvent):
00044             event = self.get_event()
00045             anchor = event.anchor
00046             if anchor not in self.anchors:
00047                 raise ComposerError(None, None, "found undefined alias %r"
00048                         % anchor.encode('utf-8'), event.start_mark)
00049             return self.anchors[anchor]
00050         event = self.peek_event()
00051         anchor = event.anchor
00052         if anchor is not None:
00053             if anchor in self.anchors:
00054                 raise ComposerError("found duplicate anchor %r; first occurence"
00055                         % anchor.encode('utf-8'), self.anchors[anchor].start_mark,
00056                         "second occurence", event.start_mark)
00057         self.descend_resolver(parent, index)
00058         if self.check_event(ScalarEvent):
00059             node = self.compose_scalar_node(anchor)
00060         elif self.check_event(SequenceStartEvent):
00061             node = self.compose_sequence_node(anchor)
00062         elif self.check_event(MappingStartEvent):
00063             node = self.compose_mapping_node(anchor)
00064         self.ascend_resolver()
00065         return node
00066 
00067     def compose_scalar_node(self, anchor):
00068         event = self.get_event()
00069         tag = event.tag
00070         if tag is None or tag == u'!':
00071             tag = self.resolve(ScalarNode, event.value, event.implicit)
00072         node = ScalarNode(tag, event.value,
00073                 event.start_mark, event.end_mark, style=event.style)
00074         if anchor is not None:
00075             self.anchors[anchor] = node
00076         return node
00077 
00078     def compose_sequence_node(self, anchor):
00079         start_event = self.get_event()
00080         tag = start_event.tag
00081         if tag is None or tag == u'!':
00082             tag = self.resolve(SequenceNode, None, start_event.implicit)
00083         node = SequenceNode(tag, [],
00084                 start_event.start_mark, None,
00085                 flow_style=start_event.flow_style)
00086         if anchor is not None:
00087             self.anchors[anchor] = node
00088         index = 0
00089         while not self.check_event(SequenceEndEvent):
00090             node.value.append(self.compose_node(node, index))
00091             index += 1
00092         end_event = self.get_event()
00093         node.end_mark = end_event.end_mark
00094         return node
00095 
00096     def compose_mapping_node(self, anchor):
00097         start_event = self.get_event()
00098         tag = start_event.tag
00099         if tag is None or tag == u'!':
00100             tag = self.resolve(MappingNode, None, start_event.implicit)
00101         node = MappingNode(tag, [],
00102                 start_event.start_mark, None,
00103                 flow_style=start_event.flow_style)
00104         if anchor is not None:
00105             self.anchors[anchor] = node
00106         while not self.check_event(MappingEndEvent):
00107             #key_event = self.peek_event()
00108             item_key = self.compose_node(node, None)
00109             #if item_key in node.value:
00110             #    raise ComposerError("while composing a mapping", start_event.start_mark,
00111             #            "found duplicate key", key_event.start_mark)
00112             item_value = self.compose_node(node, item_key)
00113             #node.value[item_key] = item_value
00114             node.value.append((item_key, item_value))
00115         end_event = self.get_event()
00116         node.end_mark = end_event.end_mark
00117         return node
